patthana8.18:1.1_0: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto
patthana8.18:1.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.18:1.1_2: naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca
patthana8.18:1.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo
patthana8.18:2.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo
patthana8.18:2.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.18:2.1_2: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavavippayuttañceva
patthana8.18:2.1_3: nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto
patthana8.18:2.1_4: ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:3.1_0: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.18:3.1_1: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca
patthana8.18:3.1_2: naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano
patthana8.18:3.1_3: ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva
patthana8.18:3.1_4: nano ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto
patthana8.18:3.1_5: ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.18:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
